thread.title: Hidden London: the best secret museums
thread.title_full: Hidden London: the best secret museums

author: Telegraph Travel
title: Hidden London: the best secret museums
text:
Can't face the queue for the Natural History Museum? Then head to one of these eight lesser-known gems, including a macabre offering in London Bridge and a quirky museum that also serves up one of the capital's best afternoon teas. 
For more great ideas, see our guide to London's 50 best unusual museums. 
Denis Severs' House, one of our favourite lesser-known museums (Photo: Getty)
